title: RGE QFN-24 (Top View) Package and Pin Labels
summary: Top-view package drawing labeled 'RGE PACKAGE (QFN-24)' for DACx578, showing pin numbers, signal names, and a central thermal pad.

structured_data.description: QFN-24 pin map with corner marker and labeled pins including AVDD, GND, SDA, SCL, LDAC, TWOC, RSTSEL, ADDR0, ADDR1, CLR, VREFIN, and VOUTA/VOUTB/VOUTC/VOUTD/VOUTE/VOUTF/VOUTG/VOUTH. Several pins are marked NC. A dashed central area is labeled Thermal pad.
